results.title: Doctor's Day: Tips To Cope With Stress And Burnout As A Doctor
results.description: National Doctor's Day honors and recognizes doctors for their relentless efforts, compassion, and commitment to promoting health and well-being. Join Dr. Varindera Paul Singh, Chairman of Neurosurgery and Neurosciences at Medanta, Gurugram, as he shares valuable tips for fellow doctors on managing stress while treating patients.
results.media:keywords: Doctor's Day,Doctor's Day 2025,National Doctor's Day 2025,Dr. Varindera Paul Singh

results.title: Watch What You Eat: Luke Coutinho Shares The Importance Of Eating Right
results.description: Being mindful of what we consume empowers us to take control of our health. Watch as integrative lifestyle expert Luke Coutinho explains the importance of being aware and informed about the food we eat to prevent food adulteration.
results.media:keywords: Importance Of Eating Right,food habbits,healthy diet,balanced diet

results.title: Prevent Obesity With These Simple Yet Effective Tips From Our Expert
results.description: Obesity is associated with a long list of chronic health conditions. Watch as Dr Monica Mahajan, Director of Internal Medicine at Max Super Specialty Hospital, Saket, New Delhi shares some effective ways to maintain a healthy weight and prevent obesity.
results.media:keywords: Obesity Risks,Fitness,Dr Monica Mahajan,Max Hospital,World Obesity Day 2025

results.title: India's Obesity Crisis: Expert Tells How To Tackle This Growing Epidemic
results.description: A recent Lancet data has revealed that about 450 million adults in India may be overweight or obese by 2050. In this video, nutritionist Pooja Malhotra shares effective strategies that can help combat obesity and promote overall health.

results.title: Healthy Eating For A Healthy Weight: Tips To Make Better Food Choices
results.description: In this video, Dr. Aparna Govil Bhasker, Consultant Bariatric and Laparoscopic Surgeon, MetaHeal- Laparoscopy and Bariatric Surgery Center, Saifee, Apollo and Namaha Hospitals, Mumbai shares advice on making balanced food choices and incorporating nutritious meals into your daily routine. These tips can help you maintain a healthy weight sustainably.
results.media:keywords: World Obesity Day 2025,Healthy Eating Tips,Food,Health,Fitness,Better Food Choices,Dr Aparna Govil Bhasker

results.title: How To Stay Active When You Have A Desk job
results.description: Being active throughout the day is easier said than done, especially if you have a desk job. Physical inactivity can increase your risk of several health conditions including obesity, diabetes, hypertension and more. Watch as nutritionist Pooja Malhotra shares tips to help you move more.

results.title: Expert Unveils The Truth Behind Obesity Myths
results.description: Obesity is a complex health issue that affects millions worldwide. However, there are many misconceptions associated with it. In this video, nutritionist Pooja Malhotra busts some common myths about obesity.
results.media:keywords: Obesity Risks,Fitness,Dr Pooja Malhotra,World Obesity Day 2025

results.title: Contemplating Weight Loss Drugs? Watch This First
results.description: Thinking about weight loss drugs? Watch as Dr Monica Mahajan, Director Internal Medicine at Max Super Specialty Hospital, Saket, New Delhi explains the potential drawbacks and risks associated with these medications. From side effects to dependency issues, our expert breaks down the truth behind weight loss drugs.
results.media:keywords: Weight Loss,Weight Loss Drugs,Dr Monica Mahajan,World Obesity Day 2025

results.title: World Obesity Day 2025: What Causes Obesity? Expert Shares Insights
results.description: Obesity is a growing health concern in India. On World Obesity Day 2025, Dr. Pradeep Chowbey, Chairman - Max Institute of Laparoscopic, Endoscopic, Bariatric Surgery & Allied Surgical Specialities, Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket explains the major causes of obesity and ways to prevent it.

results.title: World Obesity Day: How Parents Can Help Their Children Prevent Obesity
results.description: World Obesity Day is observed annually on March 4th to raise awareness about the global obesity epidemic. Establishing healthy habits early in life can help effectively minimize the risk of developing obesity. In this video, Shruti Khattar a certified nutritionist and weight loss specialist shares some tips to prevent childhood obesity.
